questions.question: What is the goal of the Traveling Salesman algorithm?

answers.a: A method to optimize traveling salesman route
answers.b: A way to book airline tickets
answers.c: A technique to pack for a long journey

questions.question: What is the main objective of the Traveling Salesman algorithm?

answers.a: To minimize the cost of travel
answers.b: To maximize the profit of the salesman
answers.c: To optimize the route taken by the salesman

questions.question: Which of the following is not a constraint of the Salesman algorithm?

answers.a: The route must start and end at the same location
answers.b: Each location must be visited exactly once
answers.c: The route must cover all locations in any order

questions.question: Which of the mentioned properties of heuristic search differentiates it from other searches?

answers.a: It provides solution in a reasonable time frame
answers.b: It provides the reasonably accurate direction to a goal
answers.c: It considers both actual costs that it took to reach the current state and approximate cost it would take to reach the goal from the current state
